mapper.select: SELECT f.favoriteNo, f.userNo, f.prodNo, b.brandName, u.userName, u.userId, c.prodPrice, f.prodSize, p.engName, p.korName, p.filePath, p.fileSize, p.saveName, p.orgName FROM Favorites f INNER JOIN users u ON f.userNo = u.userNo INNER JOIN products p ON f.prodNo = p.prodNo INNER JOIN category c ON p.categoryNo = c.categoryNo INNER JOIN brand b ON c.brandNo = b.brandNo where f.userNo = #{userNo}
